name: QUALITY FLY, S.A.
about: Quality Fly Aviation Academy, based in Madrid, is a premier flight school offering innovative and comprehensive flight training. With students from over 35 nationalities, Quality Fly provides a global learning environment delivered entirely in English. The school is renowned for its Integrated ATPL program, which includes advanced training in APS MCC, UPRT, and KSA, along with state-of-the-art glass cockpit fleet and a Full Flight Simulator Level D. Known for its high first-time examination pass rates and a strong focus on both technical and soft skills, Quality Fly ensures aspiring pilots receive the best possible preparation for their aviation careers. With a commitment to operational excellence and a supportive, family-like atmosphere, Quality Fly stands at the forefront of aviation training in Europe. Join Quality Fly to embark on a journey to excellence in the skies.
